9DBC83EEAA41400CB48726BEE3858368.description: Understand the use of geographic tools to locate and analyze information about people, places, and environments.

3CCD52408BA540318330A2AC763DF3CD.description: Understand interactions between self and the peer group.

872933E0B5FE4F5A9417E807B07145AE.description: Understand that individuals will respond to events differently.

0045302134494A67B2B61F9F29702C26.description: Understand all people have individual traits.
